00022 #include "dfsch/lib/cmdopts.h"
00023 
00024 DFSCH_DEFINE_PRIMITIVE(make_parser, "Create new command line parser"){
00025   int flags = 0;
00026   DFSCH_FLAG_PARSER_BEGIN(args);
00027   DFSCH_FLAG_SET("strict-order", DFSCH_CMDOPTS_STRICT_ORDER, flags);
00028   DFSCH_FLAG_PARSER_END(args);
00029 
00030   return dfsch_cmdopts_make_parser(flags);
00031 }
00032 
00033 static void lisp_callback(dfsch_cmdopts_t* parser,
00034                           dfsch_object_t* function,
00035                           char* value){
00036   dfsch_apply(function, dfsch_list(2, parser, dfsch_make_string_cstr(value)));
00037 }
00038 
00039 DFSCH_DEFINE_PRIMITIVE(add_option, "Define new command line option"){
00040   dfsch_object_t* parser;
00041   int has_arg;
00042   char short_opt;
00043   char* long_opt;
00044   dfsch_object_t* function;
00045 
00046   DFSCH_OBJECT_ARG(args, parser);
00047   DFSCH_STRING_ARG(args, long_opt);
00048   DFSCH_OBJECT_ARG(args, function);
00049   DFSCH_LONG_ARG_OPT(args, short_opt, 0);
00050   DFSCH_OBJECT_ARG_OPT(args, has_arg, 0);
00051   DFSCH_ARG_END(args);
00052   
00053   dfsch_cmdopts_add_option(DFSCH_ASSERT_TYPE(parser, 
00054                                              DFSCH_CMDOPTS_PARSER_TYPE),
00055                            DFSCH_TRUE_P(has_arg), short_opt, long_opt, 
00056                            lisp_callback, function);
00057   return NULL;
00058 }
00059 
00060 DFSCH_DEFINE_PRIMITIVE(add_argument, "Define new command line argument"){
00061   dfsch_object_t* parser;
00062   dfsch_object_t* function;
00063   int flags = 0;
00064 
00065   DFSCH_OBJECT_ARG(args, parser);
00066   DFSCH_OBJECT_ARG(args, function);
00067   DFSCH_FLAG_PARSER_BEGIN(args);
00068   DFSCH_FLAG_SET("required", DFSCH_CMDOPTS_ARGUMENT_REQUIRED, flags);
00069   DFSCH_FLAG_SET("multiple", DFSCH_CMDOPTS_ARGUMENT_MULTIPLE, flags);
00070   DFSCH_FLAG_PARSER_END(args);
00071   
00072   dfsch_cmdopts_add_argument(DFSCH_ASSERT_TYPE(parser, 
00073                                                DFSCH_CMDOPTS_PARSER_TYPE),
00074                              flags,
00075                              lisp_callback, function);
00076   return NULL;
00077 }
00078 
00079 DFSCH_DEFINE_PRIMITIVE(parse_list, "Parse command line from list"){
00080   dfsch_object_t* parser;
00081   dfsch_object_t* list;
00082 
00083   DFSCH_OBJECT_ARG(args, parser);
00084   DFSCH_OBJECT_ARG(args, list);
00085   DFSCH_ARG_END(args);
00086 
00087   dfsch_cmdopts_parse_list(DFSCH_ASSERT_TYPE(parser, 
00088                                              DFSCH_CMDOPTS_PARSER_TYPE),
00089                            list);
00090   return NULL;
00091 }
00092 
00093 dfsch_object_t* dfsch_module_cmdopts_register(dfsch_object_t* env){
00094   dfsch_provide(env, "cmdopts");
00095 
00096   dfsch_define_cstr(env, "cmdopts:<parser>", DFSCH_CMDOPTS_PARSER_TYPE);
00097   dfsch_define_cstr(env, "cmdopts:<error>", DFSCH_CMDOPTS_ERROR_TYPE);
00098 
00099   dfsch_define_cstr(env, "cmdopts:make-parser", 
00100                     DFSCH_PRIMITIVE_REF(make_parser));
00101   dfsch_define_cstr(env, "cmdopts:add-option", 
00102                     DFSCH_PRIMITIVE_REF(add_option));
00103   dfsch_define_cstr(env, "cmdopts:add-argument", 
00104                     DFSCH_PRIMITIVE_REF(add_argument));
00105   dfsch_define_cstr(env, "cmdopts:parse-list", 
00106                     DFSCH_PRIMITIVE_REF(parse_list));
00107 }
